name: Master Defiler
text: The lowly and the ignorant see defilers as craven and corrupt—little more than thieves with magical talent. It’s true that the defiler’s path is selfish in its way: A defiler requires energy from associates and the living world nearby to power his or her greatest spells. And it is also true is that defiling can corrupt the body and mind. But only a fool could fail to see the power that defiling offers, and you are not a fool.

features.defiler'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an extra attack, you can use arcane defiling on that attack even if the attack is not an arcane daily power
features.offensiveDefiling(11thLevel): When you use arcane defiling, one nonminion enemy within 20 squares of you takes damage equal to half your healing surge value
features.defiler'sAddiction(16thLevel): You can use arcane defiling on one arcane encounter attack power per encounter

flavorText: What does it matter if a few plants die to fuel my ambitions?
